p: It was noted in 2014 that individuals who had more than one infection with dengue had severe outcomes and took a long time to recover [ 35]. Furthermore, people of 15 years and above were more affected and most cases occurred in Kinondoni municipality. This severity was probably due to a new strain of dengue identified to be DENV2 in 2014. The earlier outbreak strain in the country was DENV3[ 34â€“ 36].
